pr_template.title: Sprint11 closure: Fix PDF generation, normalize contracts, Decimal precision
pr_template.description:
- Commit: sprint11-closure-20250908-164627
- סיכום שינויים: תיקוני PDF contract, טיפול defensive ב-scenario_id(s), שימוש ב-Decimal בחישובי yearly totals, שיפורי logging.
- Artifacts: artifacts/yearly_totals_verification_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS.zip (SHA256: FULL_SHA256_HERE)
- בדיקות: sprint11_integration_test.py -> PASS, canonical run -> PASS
- בקשת QA: אנא אמתו:
  1) PDF אמיתי ניתן לפתיחה
  2) Months: 12/12
  3) sum(monthly.net) == yearly_totals['2025'].net (diff ≤ 0.01)
- לאחר אישור QA ו-CI green — לבצע merge + tag: sprint11-closed-YYYYMMDD

qa_signoff_template.format:
QA signoff:
Name: <QA_NAME>
Time: <ISO_TIMESTAMP>
Checks:
- PDF opens and is a real PDF: YES
- Months: 12/12: YES
- sum(monthly.net) == yearly_totals['2025'].net (diff = <value>): YES
Verdict: APPROVED — ready to merge.

next_steps: 2. Attach ZIP artifact and SHA256 to PR description
4. Wait for CI green + QA approval
5. Merge to main + create tag sprint11-closed-YYYYMMDD
closure_verdict: SUCCESS - Ready for QA signoff and merge
